sdata.j: あなたは↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓に|コンパクト|ディスクをもらうでしょう。
sdata.e: You will get a CD set on your birthday.

sdata.e: Attention is focussed on the potential for growth of the personal and industrial use garbage compactor market in relation to trends in law.

sdata.e: The mirror on a compact I got from a friend has cracked.

sdata.j: |コンパクト|↑型↑↓がた↓にはおしゃれなデザインが↑多↑↓おお↓いですね。
sdata.e: There are many smart designs among the compact models, aren't there?

sdata.e: This washing machine is compact and good value for money.

sdata.j: カップラーメンの↑売↑↓う↓りは↑持↑↓も↓ち↑運↑↓はこ↓べる|コンパクト|さです。
sdata.e: The selling point of cup ramen is its compactness, which makes it easy to carry.

sdata.j: |コンパクト|な↑辞書↑↓じしょ↓で、↑持↑↓も↓ち↑運↑↓はこ↓びに↑便利↑↓べんり↓です。

sdata.j: ↑通常↑↓つうじょう↓、4WDは|コンパクト|カーより↑燃費↑↓ねんぴ↓がかなり↑悪↑↓わる↓くなるでしょう。
sdata.e: A four-by-four will usually have much worse gas mileage than a compact.
